name: DecodingError.Context
desc: The context in which the error occurred.

items.name: init(codingPath: [CodingKey], debugDescription: String, underlyingError: Error?)
items.desc: Creates a new context with the given path of coding keys and a description of what went wrong.

items.name: let codingPath: [CodingKey]
items.desc: The path of coding keys taken to get to the point of the failing decode call.

items.name: let debugDescription: String
items.desc: A description of what went wrong, for debugging purposes.

items.name: let underlyingError: Error?
items.desc: The underlying error which caused this error, if any.
